definitions: the process or action of proving or showing something to be true, genuine, or valid

examples.text: the prints will be stamped with his seal and accompanied by a letter of authentication
the authentications were both carried out by the Investigation Bureau of the Ministry of Justice

shortDefinitions: process or action of proving something to be true or valid

definitions: the process or action of verifying the identity of a user or process

examples.text: user authentication for each device ensures that the individual using the device is recognized by the company
passwords and authentications are necessary parts of system security

shortDefinitions: process or action of verifying identity of user or process
